pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - Comprehensive Overview of How ElegantStay Protects Your Personal Information and Ensures Your Privacy +91-022-2615231 Home About Contact Privacy Policy Information We Collect At ElegantStay, we collect information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, contact details, and booking preferences when using our website or making reservations. We also gather data from your device, including browsing history and IP address, to tailor and enhance your experience. Use of Information The information we collect is utilized to process your reservations, offer customer support, send marketing updates (with your permission), and improve our website and services. We will not disclose your personal information to third parties without your consent. Data Security We prioritize data security and employ various measures to safeguard your information. This includes secure storage, access controls, and regular security evaluations to ensure your data remains protected. Your Choices You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also choose to opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us. Refer to the "Contact Us" section for further instructions. Children's Privacy Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. Changes to This Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated by posting the revised policy on our website. International Transfers If your data is transferred or stored outside your country, we will adhere to all relevant data protection laws and regulations. Data Retention We will keep your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected and will then securely delete it. Legal Disclaimer We reserve the right to disclose your personal information as required by law or to comply with legal proceedings. Your California Privacy Rights (if applicable) If you reside in California, you have specific rights regarding your personal information. Learn more by contacting us. Do Not Track Signals We do not currently respond to "Do Not Track" signals from web browsers. Accessibility We are committed to ensuring our website is accessible to everyone. If you have trouble accessing this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us at elegantstay@gmail.com. Enforcement We regularly review our adherence to this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us. Aloft New Delhi Aerocity +91-022-2615231 ElegantStay Your perfect stay awaits. Enjoy luxury and comfort at ElegantStay, where every moment is special. Home About Rooms Contact Address Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
pages.terms: Terms & Conditions - Detailed Guide to Your Rights and Responsibilities at ElegantStay +91-022-2615231 Home About Contact Terms and Conditions Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using the ElegantStay Website or Services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Website or Services. Age Requirement You must be at least 18 years old to use the ElegantStay Website or Services. If you are under 18, you may only use the Website or Services under the supervision of a parent or legal guardian. User Accounts To access certain features of the Website or Services, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account details and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. User Conduct You agree to use the Website and Services in a lawful and respectful manner. You must not use the Website or Services for any illegal, harmful, or offensive purposes. Additionally, you must not interfere with others' use of the Website or Services. Third-Party Service Providers We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and delivering our services. These third parties are required to protect your information and maintain confidentiality. Social Media Features Our website may include social media features, such as Facebook buttons and widgets. These features might collect your IP address and the page you are visiting on our site, and may set a cookie to function correctly. Your interactions with these features are governed by the privacy policy of the feature provider. Changes to Our Services We may update our services or introduce new features from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in this Terms and Conditions page. Content The Website and Services may contain content that is protected by copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property laws. You agree not to use any such content without explicit permission from the owner. Links to Third-Party Websites The Website and Services may contain links to third-party websites. These links are for your convenience and do not imply endorsement. We are not responsible for the content or practices of any third-party websites. Disclaimers The Website and Services are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. We do not guarantee that the Website or Services will be uninterrupted or error-free. Limitation of Liability We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages arising from or related to your use of the Website or Services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. Indemnification You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold us harmless from and against any claims, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorney's fees) arising from or related to your use of the Website or Services. Entire Agreement These Terms and Conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and us concerning the subject matter and supersede all prior or contemporaneous communications, representations, or agreements, whether oral or written.
